https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ioaY4TI3txOn6DAlwD1lOlzXLQG.jpg This film portrays aspects of an Afghan refugee's life - his living conditions in Peshawar and his longing to return to Herat. It is also about Amir's life as a professional musician and his relationships with other musicians in Peshawar. Amir
